name: Libfx
description: Liber exchange platform officially issues token LIBFX to mobilize the support from community serving to expand the market for Liber exchange platform as well as use LIBFX as main payment method of Liber. Therefore, be our companion to make forex exchange platform bigger and stronger. The LIBFX ecosystem was borned to handle the problems of online Forex trading industry with a set of protocols that provide a decentralized, low-cost, transparent and secure trading forex experience. Now, the LIBFX transaction has never been so quick and easy with any amount, anytime and anywhere.
